title: KXNORW/KXNORB/KXNORQ/KXNORD â€” Bitwise Logical XNOR Masks

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`KXNORW k1, k2, k3`
`KXNORB k1, k2, k3`
`KXNORQ k1, k2, k3`
`KXNORD k1, k2, k3`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Performs a bitwise XNOR between the vector mask k2 and the vector mask k3, and writes the result into vector mask k1 (three-operand form).

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
